## did-jwt package

Provides a [plugin](./did-jwt.jwtmessagehandler.md) for the [MessageHandler](./message-handler.messagehandler.md) that finds and verifies a JWT in a message.

## Classes

| Class                                               | Description                                                                                                    |
| --------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [JwtMessageHandler](./did-jwt.jwtmessagehandler.md) | A plugin for [MessageHandler](./message-handler.messagehandler.md) that finds and verifies a JWT in a message. |
